content: Wonderfully said, Joely. It’s also hard to remember back to the struggle when we have the final product. My hope in getting used to sucking is to always remember what it feels like. I don’t want selective amnesia of the process, because then I wouldn’t be able to relate to others (read: everyone) going through the same process. Moreover, when I go to start again, I would have expectations other than sucking! Hack those words out, one at a time. Groom later. Today, let’s just try!
